meanings.definition: Trilobites: extinct marine arthropods with a segmented body and hard exoskeleton
meanings.sent1: The trilobites were fascinating creatures that roamed the ocean long ago.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study trilobites to learn more about ancient marine life.
meanings.sent3: The trilobites threw a party in their exoskeleton clubhouse.
meanings.sent4: The trilobites' exoskeletons were like armor protecting them from predators.
meanings.sent5: Imagining trilobites scurrying across the ocean floor brings the past to life.

meanings.definition: Trilobites: a type of fossil commonly found in sedimentary rocks
meanings.sent1: We found trilobites while exploring the rocky beach.
meanings.sent2: Collectors often search for trilobites to add to their fossil collections.
meanings.sent3: The trilobites in the museum seemed to be chatting with the other fossils.
meanings.sent4: The trilobites embedded in the rock told stories of ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of trilobites in the sedimentary rocks excited the paleontologists.

meanings.definition: Trilobites: ancient creatures that lived during the Paleozoic era
meanings.sent1: Long ago, trilobites scuttled along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The Paleozoic era was home to diverse trilobites with unique features.
meanings.sent3: The trilobites in history class always aced their exams.
meanings.sent4: In tales of the past, trilobites were the rulers of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The Paleozoic era echoes with the presence of trilobites in every fossil.
